block.l: if (!window.FilesetResolver) { // https://developers.google.com/mediapipe/api/solutions/js/tasks-vision url = "https://scratch3-files.just4fun.site/mediapipe-tasks-vision-0-10-13/vision_bundle.js" // @latest import(url).then(vision => { window.FilesetResolver = vision.FilesetResolver; window.GestureRecognizer = vision.GestureRecognizer; window.DrawingUtils = vision.DrawingUtils; }); }

if (window.gestureRecognizer) {return} const createGestureRecognizer = async () => { const vision = await FilesetResolver.forVisionTasks( "https://scratch3-files.just4fun.site/mediapipe-tasks-vision-0-10-13/wasm" ); gestureRecognizer = await GestureRecognizer.createFromOptions(vision, { baseOptions: { modelAssetPath: "https://scratch3-files.just4fun.site/mediapipe-tasks-vision-0-10-13/gesture_recognizer.task", delegate: "GPU" }, numHands: 2, }); window.gestureRecognizer = gestureRecognizer; // demosSection.classList.remove("invisible"); }; createGestureRecognizer();

let img = new Image(); img.src = base64Image; window._result = null; img.onload = function () { const results = gestureRecognizer.recognize(img); // console.log(results); if (results.gestures.length > 0) { const categoryName = results.gestures[0][0].categoryName; const categoryScore = parseFloat( results.gestures[0][0].score * 100 ).toFixed(2); const handedness = results.handednesses[0][0].displayName; let text = `GestureRecognizer: ${categoryName}\n Confidence: ${categoryScore}%\n Handedness: ${handedness}`; // return text window._result = [categoryName, categoryScore, handedness]; console.log(text); } else {window._result=[]} };

block-definition.translations: de:Kostüm aus Text _ Größe _ pt:um traje com o texto _ de tamanho _ ca:vestit amb el text _ i mida _

scripts.comment: 查看帮助说明 重构列表会导致重复 清理最后一行

block.comment: 设置旋转中心为角色的中心 需要用户手动进行，直接拼在这个积木内，会导致偏移

inputs.input: 手腕手腕 大拇指根部 大拇指第一关节 大拇指第二关节 大拇指尖端 食指根部 食指第一关节 食指第二关节 食指尖端 中指根部 中指第一关节 中指第二关节 中指尖端 无名指根部 无名指第一关节 无名指第二关节 无名指尖端 小指根部 小指第一关节 小指第二关节 小指尖端
